name: inventory-system
description: An API for managing product inventory, allowing CRUD operations on products.

resources.name: products
resources.description: Represents an individual product within the inventory.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: Stock Keeping Unit, a unique identifier for the product.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The current quantity of the product in stock.

fields.name: price
fields.description: The unit price of the product.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A detailed description of the product.
